sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import styles from './Cart.module.css' import CartContext from './Store/cart-context' function Cart(props) { let ctx = useContext(CartContext) let showOrder = ctx.items.length > 0 let emptyOrder = ctx.items.length === 0 let totalSpent = `₦${ctx.totalAmount}`; const cartItemRemoveHandler = (id) => { ctx.removeItem(id); }; const cartItemAddHandler = (item) => { ctx.addItem({ ...item, amount: 1 }); }; return (

Cart

{ emptyOrder &&

Your cart is empty

}
    {ctx.items.map((item) => (

    {item.title}

  • {`₦${item.price}`}
    • X{item.amount}
    ))}

Items:

{totalSpent}

Shipping fee:

Free

Total Amount:

{totalSpent + 2000}

{showOrder && }
) } export default Cart
